Segment.name: CQ
Segment.comment: To provide information on any certificate, license, permit, credential, or qualification

Field.name: CredentialTypeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of credential

Field.name: CredentialCategoryCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the category of a legal document giving authorization to perform an assignment

Field.name: IdentificationCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

Field.name: IdentificationCode
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: LevelOfIndividualTestOrCourseCode
Field.comment: Code identifying level of course, test, or individual

Field.name: BasisForAcademicCreditOrAwardOfCredentialCode
Field.comment: Code indicating how academic credit or a credential was granted by an institution or earned by an individual

Field.name: CredentialIssuanceOrRenewalRequirementCode
Field.comment: Code to indicate requirements necessary for an individual to receive or renew a credential

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: StateOrProvinceCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency

SyntaxNote.name: P0304
SyntaxNote.comment: If either CQ03 or CQ04 is present, then the other is required.
